Description: Description of methods used to obtain profile data
Distribution limitations for the soils data set
Date the file was first created
Date the file was last modified
Notes describing reasons for the revision
Last name of researchers involved with the experiment(s) or data
First name of researchers involved with the experiment(s) or data
Middle initial of researchers involved with the experiment(s) or data
Role of researcher in experiment or dataset preparation
Name of soil profile, usually the soil series name or equivalent. Use soil_site for specific profile locations.
Name of site where soil profile data sampled
First admin for location of site for soil profile (usually country)
Second admin level for location of site for soil profile (usually state or province)
Third admin level for location of site for soil profile (usually county or municipality)
Date soil was sampled in field (e.g., for profile description)
Soil evaporation, upper limit for stage 1
Summer soil evaporation, upper limit for stage 1
Winter soil evaporation, upper limit for stage 1
Drainage rate as fraction per day
Surface soil color, moist, using Munsell hue
Soil fertility effect on photosynthesis (0 to 1 scale)
Unique soil identifier linking to SOIL_PROFILES
Soil color of moist soil using Munsell hue
Soil texture, clay (<0.002 mm), weight percent of fine earth
Biologically active soil organic carbon by layer, expressed as g[C]/100g[soil]
Intermediate soil organic carbon by layer, expressed as g[C]/100g[soil]
Stable organic carbon by layer, expressed as g[C]/100g[soil]
Inert organic carbon by layer, expressed as g[C]/100g[soil]
Biologically active soil organic carbon by layer, fraction of total organic C
Intermediate soil organic carbon by layer, fraction of total organic C
Stable organic carbon by layer, fraction of total organic C
Inert organic carbon by layer, fraction of total organic C
Soil texture, silt (0.05 to 0.002 mm), weight percent of fine earth
Soil texture, sand (0.05 to 2.0 mm), weight percent of fine earth
Soil texture, coarse fraction (>2 mm), weight percent of fine earth
Total soil organic carbon by layer, expressed as g[C]/100g[soil]
Total soil organic matter by layer
pH of soil measured in buffer solution, from profile description
pH of soil in water, from profile description
Soil bulk density with volume determined when soil is moist (approx. 33 kPa = 1/3 bar)
Soil water content (wilting point) at 15 atmosphere pressure
Soil water content at 1/3 atmosphere pressure
Soil water content at 1/10 atmospheric pressure
Drainage rate as fraction per day, per layer
Root growth factor, soil only (0 to 1 scale)
Root exploration factor (0 to 1 scale, APSIM XF)
Soil compaction factor by layer (0 to 1 scale)
NH4 in soil based on KCl extraction, by layer
Nitrate in soil based on KCl extraction, by layer
Soil aluminum concentration in profile described
APSIM plant specific water uptake coefficient
